metadata.research_topic: Feature Comparison of Agentic AI Frameworks

claims.claim: LangChain has over 96K-99K GitHub stars as of late 2024/early 2025
LangChain has 28 million monthly downloads and 130M+ total downloads
Over 132K LLM applications built using LangChain with 4K+ open-source contributors
LangChain has 600+ integrations connecting to major LLMs, tools, and databases
CrewAI has approximately 41.3K GitHub stars (30.5K-41.3K range reported)
CrewAI averages close to 1 million monthly downloads
CrewAI has achieved 60% adoption by Fortune 500 companies within 6 months of launch
Major CrewAI customers include IBM, Microsoft, Procter & Gamble, Walmart, SAP, Adobe, and PayPal
CrewAI raised $18M by October 2024, including Series A led by Insight Partners
AutoGen has over 33K-43.6K GitHub stars (varying by source timing)
AutoGen has 890,000+ downloads of the Python package and 290+ contributors
AutoGen adopted by over 40% of Fortune 100 firms for internal agentic systems
AutoGen excels at autonomous code generation with self-correction capabilities
AutoGen achieved No. 1 accuracy on GAIA benchmark in all three levels (March 2024)
OpenAI Agents SDK has approximately 9.3K GitHub stars
OpenAI Agents SDK is provider-agnostic, supporting 100+ LLMs
Core primitives include Agents, Handoffs, Guardrails, Sessions, and Function Tools
Claude Agent SDK provides context management with automatic compaction, rich tool ecosystem, and MCP extensibility
Claude Agent SDK design principle is to give agents a computer, enabling human-like work patterns
AWS Bedrock AgentCore offers Runtime, Gateway, Memory, Identity, Browser, Code Interpreter, Observability, Evaluations, and Policy services
AWS Bedrock Agents support multi-agent collaboration with supervisor agent coordination
Robinhood scaled from 500M to 5B tokens daily using Amazon Bedrock, cutting AI costs by 80%
79% of organizations report AI agent adoption; market projected to reach $199B by 2034
Gartner predicts 33% of enterprise software will have agentic AI by 2028
75% of DIY agentic AI projects report prolonged development cycles, many failing to reach production
CrewAI prioritizes simplicity with role-based design, easiest for beginners
LangChain offers most resources but has highest learning curve
LangGraph has 11.7K GitHub stars and 4.2M monthly downloads, best for enterprise state management
